类 org.apache.log4j.Category
的使用

  • 使用Category的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.log4j
    The main log4j package.
    org.apache.log4j.config
    Package used in getting/setting component properties.
    org.apache.log4j.jmx
    This package lets you manage log4j settings using JMX.
    org.apache.log4j.pattern
    Provides classes implementing format specifiers in conversion patterns.
    org.apache.log4j.spi
    Contains part of the System Programming Interface (SPI) needed to extend log4j.

    • org.apache.log4j中Category的使用

      org.apache.log4j中Category的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  Logger
      This is the central class in the log4j package.
      声明为Category的org.apache.log4j中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected Category Category.parent
      The parent of this category.
      返回Category的org.apache.log4j中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static Category Category.getInstance(java.lang.Class clazz)
      已过时。 
      Please make sure to use Logger.getLogger(Class) instead.
      static Category Category.getInstance(java.lang.String name)
      已过时。 
      Make sure to use Logger.getLogger(String) instead.
      Category Category.getParent()
      Returns the parent of this category.
      static Category Category.getRoot()
      已过时。 
      Please use Logger.getRootLogger() instead.
      参数类型为Category的org.apache.log4j中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      org.apache.log4j.spi中Category的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  NOPLogger
      No-operation implementation of Logger used by NOPLoggerRepository.
      class  RootCategory
      已过时。 
      Replaced by RootLogger.
      class  RootLogger
      RootLogger sits at the top of the logger hierachy.
